metas.name: Snatch
metas.description: Fast-paced, darkly comedic crime film with memorable characters, similar to 'In Bruges' and 'Seven Psychopaths'.

metas.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
metas.description: British crime comedy with a quirky style and ensemble cast, matching the user's appreciation for crime and comedy.

metas.name: Reservoir Dogs
metas.description: A classic crime thriller with sharp dialogue and a non-linear narrative, similar to the user's preferred crime movies.

metas.name: Pulp Fiction
metas.description: Iconic crime film known for its dark humor, memorable characters, and stylish direction, much like 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Trainspotting
metas.description: British dark comedy-drama that showcases the grittier sides of crime.

metas.name: War Dogs
metas.description: A dark comedy based on a true story about arms dealing during the Iraq War, blending humor and war themes like 'Three Kings'.

metas.name: Burn After Reading
metas.description: Coen Brothers dark comedy with quirky characters and a convoluted plot, appealing to the user's taste for unconventional comedies.

metas.name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
metas.description: Satirical dark comedy about Cold War paranoia, providing a unique blend of humor and serious themes.

metas.name: Brazil
metas.description: Dystopian satire with dark humor and a unique visual style, appealing to the user's appreciation for unusual comedies.

metas.name: Shaun of the Dead
metas.description: Horror-comedy that blends zombie tropes with British humor, similar to '28 Days Later' but with comedic elements.

metas.name: Zombieland
metas.description: A comedy horror film about a group of people trying to survive a zombie apocalypse.

metas.name: Tucker & Dale vs Evil
metas.description: Horror-comedy subverting slasher tropes, providing a humorous take on horror genre.

metas.name: The World's End
metas.description: Science fiction comedy about an apocalyptic alien invasion, and a group of friends reuniting to revisit a pub crawl.

metas.name: Hot Fuzz
metas.description: Action-comedy parodying action films, combining elements of crime, humor, and action.

metas.name: Army of Darkness
metas.description: Horror-comedy with over-the-top violence and humor, appealing to those who enjoy the comedic side of horror.

metas.name: Edge of Tomorrow
metas.description: Action-packed science fiction with a time-loop premise and comedic elements.

metas.name: Looper
metas.description: Science fiction thriller with a time travel twist, featuring action and suspense.

metas.name: Source Code
metas.description: Mind-bending science fiction thriller involving time loops and terrorism.

metas.name: Children of Men
metas.description: Dystopian thriller set in a future where humanity is infertile, offering a dark and suspenseful experience.

metas.name: District 9
metas.description: Science fiction film with social commentary, featuring action and a unique premise.

metas.name: Prisoners
metas.description: A suspenseful and dark thriller about the abduction of two young girls.

metas.name: Wind River
metas.description: A crime thriller set on a Native American reservation, blending mystery with social commentary.

metas.name: Sicario
metas.description: A dark and intense thriller about the war on drugs on the US-Mexico border.

metas.name: No Country for Old Men
metas.description: A neo-Western crime thriller with a suspenseful plot and memorable characters.

metas.name: The Departed
metas.description: Crime thriller set in Boston, focusing on the conflict between the police and Irish mob.

metas.name: Heat
metas.description: Crime drama following a group of professional bank robbers and the detectives trying to stop them.

metas.name: LA Confidential
metas.description: Neo-noir crime thriller set in 1950s Los Angeles, featuring a complex plot and compelling characters.

metas.name: The Usual Suspects
metas.description: Crime thriller with a twist ending, known for its intricate plot and memorable characters.

metas.name: American Psycho
metas.description: Horror-comedy with a dark and satirical tone, about a wealthy investment banker who leads a double life as a serial killer.

metas.name: The Silence of the Lambs
metas.description: Classic psychological horror thriller with memorable characters and a suspenseful plot.

metas.name: Sin City
metas.description: Visually stunning crime film with a gritty and stylish aesthetic.

metas.name: A Simple Plan
metas.description: Dark thriller about three men who find millions of dollars and make a plan that quickly goes awry.

metas.name: Killing Zoe
metas.description: Crime film about a bank robbery gone wrong with plenty of violent scenes.

metas.name: Lucky Number Slevin
metas.description: Crime thriller with twists and turns.

metas.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
metas.description: Neo-noir black comedy crime film with sharp dialogue and plenty of humor.

metas.name: The Nice Guys
metas.description: Action-comedy with a detective duo investigating a missing person, similar in style to 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: War of the Worlds
metas.description: Science fiction action film about an alien invasion, with thrilling suspense.

metas.name: Gattaca
metas.description: Dystopian science fiction thriller exploring themes of genetic engineering and social inequality.

metas.name: Equilibrium
metas.description: Dystopian science fiction action film with a unique style, blending action with social commentary.

metas.name: Minority Report
